oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Reflection of a Wheat Breeder on Dr. Norman E Borlaug by Sanjaya Rajaram (Mexico)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Dr. Norman E. Borlaug
Presentation
Sanjaya Rajaram
Borlaug Summit on Wheat for Food Security
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Presentation delivered by Dr. Sanjaya Rajaram, Director of Resource Seed Mexicana (México) at the Borlaug Summit on Wheat for Food Security in Ciudad Obregon (Mexico) on March 26, 2014.
